title: reading-notes-English-learning-e01-abandon
content:
读书笔记 #E01 Abandongraph TD
subgraph Word Abandon
    A(abandon) --> |禁令| B(ban)
    A --> |捆绑| C(band)
    C --> |捆绑| C0(bind)
    C --> |被束缚的,跳| C1(bound)
    C1 --> |弹起|F(bounce)
    C1 --> |边界|C2(boundary)
    C --> |绷带,绑|C3(bandage)
end

graph TD   
subgraph 词根词缀
    Z0((前缀)) --> Z01[英语中的前缀无一例外表示的都是方向] --> Z02[上下前后里外等]
    Z02 --> Z03[a] 
    Z03 --> |在,朝向| Z030[at]
    Z03 --> |离开| Z031[ab]
    Z1((后缀))
    Z1 --> |n./adj.|Z11[ary]
end
